channel.title: How can i add yk' tharlak the Thunderous
channel.description:
I have no idea how to spell his name so i guess...doesnt matter i already know how to add him and give him drops but im wanting to give him his special abilities like he does in dungeoneering if anyone can find out how to do that plzz post a comment with the coding please ty gb :)
Most developers cannot find out :( i wonder why??
